website_summaries.verdict: The Libratone Q Adapt Lightning earphones offer a strong audio experience for iPhone users coupled with solid, relatively affordable noise cancellation.
pros: Powerful, sculpted sound with various EQ modes
cons: Only works with iOS mobile devices that have a Lightning port

customer_reviews.title: Great performance!
customer_reviews.text: I have had numerous flights in the last month and have used these. They perform great and are very comfortable(better than Bose). The noise reduction works great and you can improve the sound with app. They perform equal or exceed Bose in ear. I like the way they just fit without all the hassle that others require. I would recommend to any music fan.
customer_reviews.author: P. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Solves problems that I didn’t know I had
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this, I was simply looking for quality headphones that plug into a lightning cable. I didn’t know that I needed headphones that were particularly resistant to tangling. I wasn’t thinking about noise canceling. Even the light pink peachy color that matches my rose gold iPhone! These headphones were made with incredible attention to detail. They include a ton of smart features at a very reasonable price. From the soft case magnetic case to the songbird branding on the headphones to how easy it is to use, each component works to make my time at a super crowded budget gym and on a subway commute more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid build and big sound.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have definitely exceeded my expectations. They are simple and well thought out. I love the woven chord, which is great for someone like me who's super hard on their headphones. I was pleasantly surprised to find that these are actually noise cancelling headphones unlike most other in-ear headphones that only plug your ears. The app is great and really straight forward for tuning the headphones. I find that treble boost sounds the best. As someone who would consider themselves an audiophile, I'm stoked on the overall build quality, the sound, the seal, and lack of sound leaking out when I'm blasting tunes at the workplace.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very good noise-canceling. Durability issues -- already once sent in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good noise-canceling. Durability issues -- already once sent in for warranty repair, but that process was relatively quick and painless. The lightning adapter powering the headphones is excellent because you don't have to worry about charging issues like with Bose. But you have to plan ahead and make sure your phone is fully charged for long flights, for example, if you want to benefit from this. Doesn't drain the iPhone battery much. Excellent choice of ear bud covers, with six to choose from. Overall, a great, sleek, and genuinely compact choice to the Bose product line.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin, Simon, Fyodor

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I never expected this headset could be so perfect before I buy it. I had one pair of beats earphones before but it is too big to fit my ears. Libratone provides three different earbud sizes which are really humanistic! Also, it has four levels of noise control, really flexible for my needs. I don't want my music volume to be too loud when I was outside which is harmful to my ears, at the same time if the earphones have a high level of noise cancellation it will make me feel dizzy. Libratone fixed my problem, I can choose the noise cancellation level, it's really a perfect headset for me.
customer_reviews.author: chemlcx

customer_reviews.title: The ear tips sizing can be perfect for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of wireless earbuds before but I lost one of the buds soon after. Experience tells me that wireless gadgets don’t stay with me LOL. So I decided to look for a pair of active noise cancellation buds that is not WIRELESS. And I found this! Very comfortable, fits my ear holes very well. Noise cancellation isn’t as great as Bose but I can at least enjoy music on the subway. And the earbuds come with 6 different ear tips, 2 of them are not the usual types, they are as comfortable in my ears as Apple headphones. Absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joslin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Included tips are bad, sound quality is passable
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of earphones and headphones; I already own the Bose QC25-II and was looking for something slightly more pocketable for shorter flights, so the Q-Adapt got my attention. In short, the included tips are absolutely terrible and neither of the tips fit my ears properly so unless I'm sitting perfectly still they won't make a seal and will fall straight out. The noise cancelling and sound quality is passable, it's not great, but it's also not terrible. I didn't like using the app and the different NC levels by clicking the remote/app were just annoying; I'd rather these just work like my Bose QC25 (which doesn't sound amazing, but NC is best-in-class). Might be worth if ~$80
customer_reviews.author: The Digital Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable ear buds
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are very well packaged, and the quality of the product is beyond my expectation. The sound quality was surprisingly good especially the bass. For the noise canceling, I have to say the active noise canceling was not as good as my over-ear big bose headphone. But the noise was indeed reduced for sure. It has several noise canceling levels but I don't quite feel a huge difference between these levels. Overall, I would say it is a high quality earbuds and worked well with my iphone and ipad mini.
customer_reviews.author: James L

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or money. Returned mine in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Average at best, in every way. Sound quality was average at best, but did not get very loud. Standard Apple headphones had better sound quality and volume. I was a sound engineer for 15 years and have discerning hearing. Noise cancellation was laughably below average. Again, just did not live up to expectations. Comfort was not great. Spend the extra money and get Bose or Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for middle-of-the-road price point and decent sound. Instead, I received BIG amazing sound at a fraction of the price in comparison to other high-end products. These headphones are very comfortable, and come with various tips to fit you ear. I have been using these headphones for some time now and they have held up well. The noise blocking feature is a must, and has three different settings for anyone seeking quality sound in differing environments. I would recommend these to anyone who wants quality sound at a more affordable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harlan

customer_reviews.title: These earbuds are very well made and sound great! The noise cancellation works extremely well and when ...
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are very well made and sound great! The noise cancellation works extremely well and when these are in the rest of the world is tuned out. I love that about them! In fact the sound is so great that on some songs I can hear instruments I didn't even know were there while playing on other devices. Yes they are expensive but isn't everything these days? Quality costs and Libratone offers the quality you're looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They really do cancel out the background noise. I've been sitting here playing around with them and with my TV basically blasting and with the headphones in my ears I can't hear it at all. I bought these to take on vacation - my husband likes to blast the TV and he's up a lot later than I am. I'll finally have some peace. Now I have to get an iPad so I can read my Kindle books in peace as well (or just read them on my iPhone.) Thanks for a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Frannie Z

customer_reviews.title: Love the headphones, love the speaker
customer_reviews.text: I first got to know Libratone via a Univ. of Notre Dame presentation in Silicon Valley. I found the presentation great, and bought two of the speakers. Then I recently needed new headphones with noise cancellation features. These are fantastic, as well: plug and play with an iPhone app that adjusts qualities, and now my two Libratone products are in synch: plug in the headphones and my Spotify is "in my head"; unplug the Libratone headphones and the sound moves seamlessly to my Libratone speaker. What a beautiful way to deliver for customers. Thanks, Libratone!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: These have been perfect for drowning out the noise at the gym when ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for quality headphones that wouldn't break my piggy bank and these have definitely fit the bill. These have been perfect for drowning out the noise at the gym when on machines. When I first purchased I thought there's no way earbuds could sound proof but as soon as I put them in I was proved wrong. I recommend these for anyone, perfect for studying, workout, or for anything really. Really happy with my purchase would buy again 100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall sound in a quiet room very similar (maybe not ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall sound in a quiet room very similar (maybe not quite as good) as stock apple earbuds. Noise canceling is meh. Most of the noise "canceling" seems to come from the soft ear pieces - they send 5 different types - which fit snuggly. Haven't tried them on airplane yet. UPDATE AFTER USING ON AIRPLANE - downgraded to 2 stars. Worthless on airplane and no better than just standard earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: Really poorly build headphones. Do not recommend them at all. The reason is three fold. Sound quality is not worth the price tag they don’t sound much better than the apple EarPods. The mic is horrible and picked up so much background noise I had to drop from multiple meetings. These just don’t meet the standard they should have with their price tag. The build quality is decent at least they have a breaded cable which I am a huge fan of and the construction of the earphones themselves are solid but as far as usability and sound quality goes look else where.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Michael Kitada

customer_reviews.title: I returned them for a refund
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for recording my voice while singing. I didn’t notice a difference from a 20 dollar pair of recording headphones
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, low sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these but I can’t. The sound quality is worse than my $15 earbuds from Rite Aid. On calls I had to turn the volume all the way up and I could still barely hear anything. None of the six tips fit in my ears, which has never been an issue with any earbuds before. There’s a seam that the tips don’t cover that rubs against my ears and is extremely uncomfortable. You’re better off with Apple’s lighting earbuds. Definitely not even close to worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: problems. Need return
customer_reviews.text: I just received my dream earphone. FirstlyI want to say Amazon global is so fast! This is really cool! But secondly I want to say when I open the bag, my product box is not very clear, and it looks like someone opened it since it didn’t have any warp and looks not very cool. I don’t know this is normal thing looks like in Amazon global or not? And thirdly when I downloaded the App, it shows this earphone already registered with another account. Sounds like I receive a someone returned product and he or she didn’t delete the register account on libertone app.
customer_reviews.author: Yolo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! I never bothered with noise cancelling headphones before because the price was also too high. These are a great price and they really do work. I didn't totally understand the app when I first got them but it turns out to be a cool and really helpful feature. The headphones are also super comfortable and the chords never get tangled which more of perk than you know. Taking calls using them is also super easy, much clearer than an iPhone earbuds. All around a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: We were thrilled to have a better noise cancelling headphone. For the price it should have been terrific. But it's fallen apart, now there's a crackling noise that sounds like a short, and the ear pieces are really uncomfortable, even after changing out the foam parts. Looking for a way to return them...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Yanover

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but very delicate
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 of these earbuds at this point, as I love the sound quality and the noise cancellation. Unfortunately I have to keep buying new ones since this product is EXTREMELY delicate. I've had earbuds stop working, the input no longer working, and the headphone wire causing sound issues where if not kept in the same place at all time, the earbuds stop working. if you commute every day, and are looking for a great pair of earbuds that will last you a while...KEEP LOOKING. Great concept, decent materials, poor execution for the customer experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S. Kelman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these headphones to help tune other people out at the gym, and they work perfectly! Seriously- I don't want to hear you grunting or yelling. I've used some other headphones that were meant more for exercise and they constantly fall out. These stay snugly in place and feel secure. What I was surprised about was that there is actually a little base too! Overall I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Finley

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with ok sound but there is a distinct sound when the noise cancellation turns on which made these unpleasant to wear. I haven't worn nose cancelling headphones before so I can't compare but I didn't like the feature
customer_reviews.author: tf

customer_reviews.title: Noise reduction as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like ear cushions, swapped with Complys. Really does provide noise reduction. Not as loud as my Klipsch ear buds, or Bose Quiet Comfort 15 headphones. Comply ear cushions make these ear buds all day comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Iwantsomewine

customer_reviews.title: Fair Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: I deduct one star for cost, as the noise reduction is fair. The build and fit are very good. I don't think they're worth the cost however. The other star is deducted for the app which logs me out, and then can't log on in airplane mode (as happens on an actual airplane). I took the app off the phone, and the unit still works and adjusts from the cord control. So, I'm not sure why the app is needed except to update firmware and harvest information from the user. I've found the sound spectrum works best for me for the iphone by adjusting Settings>Music>EQ>Flat.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound quality let down by bad durability
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound ok for the price range with good separation and punch. Problems with the lightning cable started about six months into ownership. Where the cable connects to the connector the signal started shorting when the cable would move. Disappointing that the attention to detail in braiding did not actually extend to the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling very hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling adds a lot of white noise and induces dizziness for me. The oddly shaped fitting pieces weren’t fitting either, sound quality is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Hanfei Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Device not supported error on iPhone.
customer_reviews.text: After installing the Libratone app, firmware updates and general "tips and tricks"....the Libratone Lightning in-Ear Active Noise Cancelling Earbuds do not work on my iPhone 7 with full battery charge. I have had the product for 2 months and began experiencing issues near Apples update timelines.....either Libratone is doing very poor on reporting their tech to Apple and complying with Apple rules.....or the specific product I received is defective.
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Great ear buds, great noise cancelation in a compact package.
customer_reviews.text: Great ear buds, very comfortable, I wear them all day. Love the adjustable noise cancelation levels and the pass through mode for biking in traffic. Really like that they draw power from the phone and do not require an additional large and unruly battery pack. The sound quality is very good for ear buds. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carnivorousgnar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: not bad, good to have a pair of high quality earbuds that goes directly to lightning cable. None of the optional buds feel particularly comfortable in my ears, but i can probably get alternatives that’ll feel better. Sound quality is pretty good and noise cancellation is not bad. I’ve used some high quality headphones, and it doesn’t compare, but it’s certainly a step above the apple earbuds, which is what most of us here are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Justus Wise

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the QAdapt in-ear headphones because of the promised noise-cancelling feature. I found this feature disappointing, especially when traveling on a plane or train when I needed it most. The sound quality was quite good, and they are comfortable. Recently, I was on a phone call when I heard a loud, piercing tone (like an audio test) in the left earbud. Then, the sound totally cut off. They no longer connect to any device. If you are looking for a reliable, truly noise-cancelling earbud, these are not your best bet.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I like these ear buds because they are comfortable to use and the sound quality is awesome. I'm on my 3rd pair. After several months they just stop working, What I believe happens is the connection at the lightning connector wears out, then the ear buds short out, and stop working. I keep buying them because they are so damn comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: runlight

customer_reviews.title: Hiss is too loud
customer_reviews.text: The background static hiss is too load comparing to other competitors like Bose or even Pioneer Rayz.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancellation and sound + a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing I've been looking for a pair of ear buds that provide quality noise cancelling as well as quality sound and I'm glad I found these! I love the sleek design too, Apple headphones never sat in my ear properly and would start to hurt after a while but I don't have that problem with these ones
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Massey

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, they work as advertised, just really wastes ur phone battery, and would rather just use wireless headphones instead of charging phone all day.
customer_reviews.author: iBvrn

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones after a friend recommended them and I absolutely love them! They were comfortable to wear and I forgot I had them on. I wear them to workout and they don't fall out. I've been writing my master's thesis and was able to tune out the outside noise and concentrate on my paper. Would definitely recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: KW.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and  adjustable noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality earbuds! The app is the key to optimal noise canceling control. The app will let you select the level of noise canceling you personally like. These are on par with the Bose noise canceling earbuds both in quality and the app functions. My family own both and I have used both on airplanes, buses and trains. The cord was a little stiff at first however with a little use and movement it will be more flexible. I recommend tLibratone Q adapt earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: M. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't happy about WHY I had to buy these for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy about WHY I had to buy these for my iPhone 8Plus, but at least they are a top notch product. Noise cancelling and they fit well in the ears.
customer_reviews.author: CuteBaldChick

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with small ears. Noise canceling works very well.
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has small ears. She did not like these because of the size. It came with several interchangeable rubber ear pieces but the big bulky ear bud made it not fit. She did tell me that the noise canceling worked very well! While it is not this companies fault. I wish there wasn’t so much battery drain from these.
customer_reviews.author: B S

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality sound, cord is funky/cheap/gets tangled easily - the app to adjust the sound is very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for someone so I can't really say anything about sound etc. However, it looks it's made with good materials and made well. The person I gifted to told me that she loves the headphones, especially the pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was absolutely adorable and I couldn't wait to open them
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when these arrived. They not only arrived on time, but actually a day early. The packaging was absolutely adorable and I couldn't wait to open them. The durability of the chord is excellent and seems like it will last forever! These light weight earbuds are going to go everywhere with me, and I'm really liking the pouch that came with it too. Lastly, this product also came with extra ear pieces to change out when they get dirty. I LOVE that!! It's lightning cable feature is also a huge plus for new iPhone users with out the auxiliary plug! Can't wait to start using my Libratone Q Adapt In Ear Eerbuds more!
customer_reviews.author: Josh King

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Hav e been using these for about 1 month. They fit well in my ears. Really comfortable even wearing outside and at the beach. The sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy Boy

customer_reviews.title: my reliable working assistant
customer_reviews.text: I need wired earphones because I need conduct phone meetings using my iphone and I do not trust Bluetooth ones. These earphones are my reliable working assistant. The voice is crystal clear so I wont miss any information in the meeting.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Continually failing
customer_reviews.text: I'm about to exchange my fourth pair in one one year. I purchased last October and they tend to fail after a 3 months (last one only lasted a month). Give them their due Libratone support immediately exchanged the units but i am conccerend that they will stop doing so after October. When working the earphones work fine and i find them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Norton

customer_reviews.title: My new go to earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely now my go to earbuds. Love the design, excellent cable. Sound quality is very good and the noise cancellation is great. They are excellent for music and phone calls. Worn them on several flights as well and they are very comfortable for short and long trips. Pleasantly surprised that they seem to not put any extra drain on iPhone battery. Sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Tickle

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March and they have stopped working in November. Hoping that Libratone will back up their product. Phones reads they are not supported. Tried the "tricks" and still no go.
customer_reviews.author: Kschmittz

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought it along with Pioneer Rayz Plus Smart Noise Cancelling Earphones from Amazon. I like this better than the Rayz plus in that it's less bulkier but I sometimes found it useless when I was running out of battery. A decent product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling is good but not as loud as I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Not as loud as I was hoping for but noise is good
customer_reviews.author: John Brotherton

customer_reviews.title: and boy was I happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I rushed the delivery of the Qs to get them in time for my recent trip abroad, and boy was I happy I did. The noise canceling worked like a charm and even helped drown out the sounds of the passenger snoring next to me! The color matches my rose gold case almost perfectly. I especially like the cloth like feeling of the cord, and that it's long enough to avoid getting tangled in. Super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid alternative to big noise-canceling headphones
customer_reviews.text: They are great alternative to carrying a large, over-the-ear headset and well made/durable. The carrying case is a little too small and you do not get any noise cancellation when using a power/sound splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Reed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful buds, but the ear piece attachment fell off easily.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ear buds, good sound quality, but the ear piece attachment fell off easily. I lost one piece during my travel and could not use it for the rest of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling works really good, sound quality is good, can telling when I play heavy metal music. It’s a little pricy compared with $20 something earphones, It is worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruosen

customer_reviews.title: These headphones were great for blocking out office noise
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were great for blocking out office noise. I work in a room with my team all day, so there are always side conversations happening. These headphones let me block out the chatter and concentrate on getting work done! I was also surprised with the comfort and fit of the earbuds. Much more comfortable than the Apple ones that came with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Great noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones! The noise canceling feature is like white noise, but it works quite well. I bought the pink refurbished ones and I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sauceboss143

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for what they do.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are overpriced. Sound quality is decent, but not worth the expense and no better than many $20-30 headphones. The software is too cutesy and difficult to use. Form and style took priority over ease of use. The "City Mix" software essentially plays pre-recorded white noise while you're listening to an audiobook or podcast. That's it. No active noise cancelling. Not worth $150.
customer_reviews.author: A_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ear Buds
customer_reviews.text: Love these ear buds. Very comfortable and eliminates a lot of outside noise. Especially good for flying and using where there's distracting background noise.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancelling is decent. I wear them when riding a bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bunburyist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, good sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, good sound, reasonable noise cancellation, very compact with no batteries, external box or anything else. Works really well with Apple devices
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I really wanted to like these Headphones... Unfortunately they are too big for my ear and hurt having them on for longer than 5 minutes. Also, the noise cancellation is not as good as I had expected, there is some cancellation, but not as much as the manufacturer portrays in their website. Something that REALLY disappointed me is that the volume in these headphones was VERY low, even the headphones that came with my Roku 3 are louder... Wanted to like them, but just couldn't... many issues for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto A Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my handsfree
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sound quality and how effective the noise cancellation is. These are super comfortable, long and high quality. It’s totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shikha Saini

customer_reviews.title: Returned... couldn’t find ear piece that worked.  Wish it fit better.
customer_reviews.text: Noise canceling was great in airplanes and noisy environments, but ear pieces had funky design, would not stay in my ears during even minor exercise movements. Tried multiple rubber ear pieces sent with them, none worked any better. Reluctantly returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Leib Lurie

customer_reviews.title: everything about this product is great. From the packaging
customer_reviews.text: Besides the delayed shipping, everything about this product is great. From the packaging, to the informational inserts, the app, and the quality of the sound itself. Love the different color options as well. I appreciate the customizable ear pieces, as I have a smaller ear. Would def recommend these ear buds to anyone looking for a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is a little lacking like cancels out when inserted one way vs another.
customer_reviews.author: Micki Jelikovsky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have great quality. I almost gave up on non-apple earbuds, until I found these. Sound quality is great and the mic works well.
customer_reviews.author: Aiyana

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy these! They definitely cancel out background noise
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these! They definitely cancel out background noise! I like that you can change the amount of noise that is canceled out. I recommend them for people whom commute on Bart or busses, they work really well to drown out any humming or people conversations! I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Great and all but..
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty great headphones, but the only thing I don’t like is, it’s not loud enough. The quality of the sound is perfect, don’t get me wrong. But the noise doesn’t go high enough. If it would make the music louder it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Bare

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good quality -- 1 big flaw, Microphone is super sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, good quality -- 1 big flaw, Microphone is super sensitive and picks up surrounding sounds. Not usable in an office talking on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: RegalPrince

customer_reviews.title: great sound and no batteries
customer_reviews.text: I got these when they were on sale for $50 or so. Sound and fit are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob O

customer_reviews.title: Ok for travelling in train and in plane
customer_reviews.text: Sound is quite good - and in a limited way adjustable to personal liking (3 positions : flat or bass - or highs improved) Noise cancellation works in limited way Mostly depending on tight fitting of silicone earbuds These earbuds are too easy to be lost as I think that they are not tight enough on the headphone. I have had several times the joy of searching them and I lost one - now using a bigger one which is not comfy. Bose in-ear are far better but far more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Jo K

customer_reviews.title: Grateful owner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones! It took me a long time to finally get these, mainly because of how expensive these are, but I'm grateful I did. The sound quality is superb! I have a classical list on my iPhone that has been set on fire, I listen to it on repeat and it sounds new to me. It's so crisp and clear and I love them. Side note I also like the lightning cable because that's how most headphones break on me, but with these you can tell that they build them so well. I also like the size of the plug in for the iPhone because it is easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Fit Comfortably in My Ear
customer_reviews.text: These headphones just don't fit well in my ear. They fit loosely and so the sound quality is affected. Its so bad that even at full volume I sometimes can't hear my podcast when on a subway. Didn't have this issue with other earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working in 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: These stopped working 2 months after purchasing and the return window was already closed and couldn't return them.
customer_reviews.author: This Girl

customer_reviews.title: Save yo money honey
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last very long before it started to cut out
customer_reviews.author: Alistar Davis

customer_reviews.title: Low volume
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy them but ( there’s always as but ) the volume doesn’t get as loud as I would like.. quality is good though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, very bad microphone
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable into the ears ,sound is nice but not as much as JBL's one, the microphone sound is terrible I couldn't call people with it. Bottom line: Over valued
customer_reviews.author: Sulaiman Budai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works great and the sound is amazing! Would recommend to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great but I accidentally order it so I had to send it back. 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love these! the cable is stronger than wire and ...
customer_reviews.text: love these! the cable is stronger than wire and is sturdier than most headphones out there
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan Fox

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was actually quite good, but I especially wanted the noise cancellation feature ...
customer_reviews.text: I received these today, but, even after insuring I had installed properly sized earpieces and installed the iOS app, I discovered that the noise cancellation feature was almost imperceptible. There was barely any difference between the various settings, although when on "hush", I could hear a bit of hissing. The sound quality was actually quite good, but I especially wanted the noise cancellation feature to work. I had tried the Bose® - QuietComfort® 20, was hugely impressed with their noise cancellation, but wasn't crazy about a non-replaceable battery. VERY disappointed and I'll return these tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: GaryG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality, sound is just amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality, sound is just amazing! but those who want to use it in gym will be a bit dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite earphones
customer_reviews.text: These were my absolute favorite earphones until they were stolen
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Gates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable with good noise reduction. Looks like it will be more durable than other noise reduction ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: John in MN

customer_reviews.title: Great for music but very bad for calls
customer_reviews.text: When on phone call people can't hear you well even if you turn off the noise cancelation.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Fit in the ear nicely. Wasn't sure I wanted over the ear coverage
customer_reviews.text: Fit in the ear nicely. Wasn't sure I wanted over the ear coverage. Would prefer if they had a wireless/bluetooth option but will have to wait...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make my walks so much better
customer_reviews.text: I just got these headphones about a week ago, and absolutely love them. Every morning I walk into work alongside two busy roads (Van Ness Avenue and Lombard Street). The walk is usually about an hour, and with my old headphones I could always hear all of the traffic and would have to crank up my music to drown out part of the noise. Way different experience with these new libratone earphones!! They cancel out the traffic so well, and have changed my walk to work for the better! I would definitely buy products from Libratone again and would recommend these headphones to anyone who needs great noise cancelling earphones!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Keys

customer_reviews.title: for music
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality for playing music but poor sounding for taking phone calls
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancellation only OK.  App doesn't work without internet connection
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect Bose type of noise cancellations. Also, if you plan to use them on the plane without any internet, note that the app doesn't work since they force you to login anytime you use their app. The app controls noise cancellation. True, you can use the physical button for noise cancellation if you remember you can do this, but why wouldn't they allow you to use the app for that purpose without an internet connection? Just seems not customer friendly. And $179 for these? Nope, Bose offers better NC and music for that price without tying the charge port on the new iPhone... Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Regis Haegler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The noise-cancelling feature is very good. They are comfortable and stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Mau

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! The only problem is that they sometimes glitch and there’s a random black spot on the control buttons when I got them
customer_reviews.author: Alex Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I tried all different size of ear plugs to get a great fit, but none cut out the background noise
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but this product deserved one. I tried all different size of ear plugs to get a great fit, but none cut out the background noise. Maybe I got 5% reduction --- maybe. I also found the right earbud tended to fall out of my ear I returned them and bought the Phiaton BY 220 noise cancelling earbugs for roughly the same price, and they are fantastic - noise reduction under the same situations was 95% --- so much reduction it was actually a little eerie on how quiet things were
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EarBuds - Review
customer_reviews.text: Got these the other day. Great product quality, argonomics are very pleasing, sound canceling works quite well, different ear bud condoms make for an easy fitting process, and overall sound quality is a solid A
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones (in ear) that I've tried (and I've tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Best Headphones (in ear) that I've tried (and I've tried many). Fit in ear is solid and comfortable. Having multiple settings for active noise control works surprisingly well. The sound quality is also very good (at least to my subjective assessment). There is an app that works (though not necessary as the controls on the head phones enable changing ANC settings, pause, volume up and volume down) but it requires logging in each time so I largely ignore it as the additional settings available there in are not mission critical. The cable segment is well made and for me the right length (plus there is little entangling that has bugged me with other brand units).
customer_reviews.author: George E. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality and perfect to wear when I'm working ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality and perfect to wear when I'm working out. Love the different size ear buds that fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Sound is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love it. A little expensive, but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: TechSupportMiami

customer_reviews.title: Really the worst, most expensive in ear headphones I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Really the worst, most expensive in ear headphones I’ve ever purchased. They quit working after one mont of use, the sound was nearly as rich as I had hoped and the rubber ear gasket fell off almost immediately. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Unusable while moving
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation is excellent, as is the ability to power the headphone through the lightening connection (no extra power pack). However, the design of the cable casing is terrible. The cable picks up scratches, bumps, and scrapes anytime the cable brushes against anything. These noises are transferred to the listener (both you and the person you may be speaking with). They are basically unusable while moving (try walking without your headphone cable bumping your collar or jacket).
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: These earphones are seriously amazing! I play basketball and whenever I train the ...
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are seriously amazing! I play basketball and whenever I train the standard apple earphones always slip out or sit uncomfortably but these fit perfectly and don't budge which is a major key for me. I've never had noise canceling earphones before so when I first plugged these in I sat and played with the noise control and was shocked with how well it blocked out noise. On top of all that, they're just super sharp looking, though I wish the volume/noise canceling control was a little smaller. I got the nude color to match my gold IPhone 7 and they pair together nicely 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Peggy W.

customer_reviews.title: These headphones provide excellent noise cancellation with minimal size
customer_reviews.text: These headphones provide excellent noise cancellation with minimal size. I use them on airplanes traveling to and from work, and they block a significant amount of the ambient noise from the aircraft. I also use them while walking my dogs, and the city noise feature makes it easy to talk to neighbors or my wife when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Tiann Keegan

product_meta.title: Libratone Q Adapt In Ear – Adjustable Noise Cancelling Headphones – Lightning Powered for iOS Devices – 4 Level Noise Cancellation (Stormy Black)
product_meta.description: Libratone Q Adapt In-Ear: because you decide how much of the world to let in. Q Adapt features Libratone’s Signature Sound Profile designed to provide a full range of crisp, clear, enhanced sound. The Q Adapt In-Ear offers 4 levels of CityMix Adjustable Noise Cancellation for your Lightning connected iOS device. Level 1: Keep the music playing while still letting in 80% of outside sound. Talk to people around you without removing your headphones. Level 2: Enjoy your music with maximum awareness and safety with 60% of outside sound, making them great for commuting. Level 3: Stay focused by blocking outside noise while still allowing people to get your attention when needed. It’s perfect for a busy office or studying in public. Level 4: Totally immerse yourself in sound by blocking 100% of outside noise whether traveling by plane or simply silencing your world. CityMix ANC allows you to enjoy music at any volume by activating the ANC to cancel outside noise, then play on. Because simplicity is everything, the four-button remote lets you access CityMix, activate the Hush function, Play, Pause, make and take calls, or crank up the volume. Unlike other noise-cancelling, in-ear headphones, Q Adapt draws power directly from your iOS device. The lightning-powered earbuds are more efficient, too – they won’t drain your battery, so you can use ANC for 50+ hours on an iPhone 6 Plus or 7. Libratone Q Adapt In-Ear headphones are compatible with iOS devices with a lightning port including iPhone 5, Phone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPhone 6/6 Plus, iPhone 6S/6S Plus, iPhone SE, iPhone 7/7 Plus, iPad (4th gen), iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad Pro (9.7" and 12.9" models) iPad Mini (1st gen), iPad Mini 2, iPad Mini 3, iPad Mini 4, iPod Nano (7th gen), iPod Touch (5th gen), and iPod Touch (6th gen). Libratone is proud to offer the best lightning headphones on the market, so we provide a 30-day money-back guarantee and we're here to help you with 24/7 US based customer support for all of our products.
feature_bullets: LIGHTNING CONNECTED: Powered by iOS Lightning Connector to power adjustable noise cancellation and to amplify your music for premium sound
ADJUSTABLE NOISE CANCELLATION: CityMix ANC with four adjustable noise cancellation levels for customizing your listening experience
FOUR BUTTON CONTROLS: Use the four-button remote to access CityMix, activate the "Hush" function, play, pause, make and take phone calls, or to simply crank up the volume
ENJOY QUIET PHONE CALLS: The Built-in microphone allows you to take calls hands free, and active noise cancellation minimizes background noise
PREMIUM SOUND: Libratone's signature sound profile features a balance of deep bass, full midrange and crisp highs to ensure any genre of music sounds great. Please refer the User Guide before use.
